text: Hotelnya bersih, staff nya ramah-ramah sekali. Waktu menginap ada 1 kejadian kamar tiba-tiba berasap dan bau kebakar terus suami langsung menghubungi pihak hotel tapi alhamdulillah semua penanganannya cepat sekali ternyata ada problem di AC karena habis kejadian dari siang kamar terasa panas akhirnya malamnya suami saya komplain dan teknisinya dengan sigap mengecek ternyata benar ada yang terbakar jadi membuat AC kamar tidak dingin, karena di dalam pengerjaan kami ditawarkan move kamar sama teknisinya karena kan sudah malam dan ada bayi juga, tapi alhamdulillah selang beberapa menit mau pindah ternyata AC kembali dingin dan suami saya memutuskan untuk tetap di kamar itu karena males juga rapi-rapi nya hehe. Makasi eL Hotel Royale sangat memuaskan nginep di sana menu breakfast nya juga bervariatif dan enak-enak, tapi sayang saya dari awal sudah request minta kamar best view karena staycation kaliini edisi ulang tahun suami tapi tidak dapat kamar best view dan untuk cake juga kena charge hehe tapi ga apa-apa kami puas menginap di sini lain kali kalau ke Bandung pasti bakal balik lagi.

translated_text: the hotel is clean, the staff is very friendly. during our stay, there was an incident where the room suddenly started smoking and smelled of burning, and then my husband immediately contacted the hotel, but thank god, everything was handled very quickly. it turned out there was a problem with the ac because after the incident, the room felt hot in the afternoon. finally, in the evening, my husband complained and the technician quickly checked it and it turned out to be true. something was on fire so the room air conditioner wasn't cold, because during the work we were offered to move the room by the technician because it was late and there was a baby too, but thank god after a few minutes we wanted to move it turned out the air conditioner was cold again and my husband decided to stay in that room because i'm too lazy to be neat hehe. thank you, el hotel royale, it was very satisfying to stay there. the breakfast menu was also varied and delicious, but unfortunately i asked for the best view room from the start because this staycation was my husband's birthday but i couldn't get the best view room and the cake was also charged hehe but it's okay, we are satisfied staying here. next time we go to bandung, we will definitely come back again.

text: Alhamdulillah pas hari pertama tipe merdeka full, jadi saya dapat freepgrade di condotel, dapat kamar 1043. Tapi pas hari ke 2 (booking baru dan harganya selisih 120 ribu an) tanyat ready di tipe merdeka jadi saya harus pindah. Kemudian diberi alternatif oleh fo-nya dengan membayar 200 ribu agar tetap di condotel tersebut, jadi saya tetap di condotel. Kalau di condotel karena modelnya seperti apartemen jadi lumayan luas kamarnya... ada bathtub... dan ada sofa. Hanya di kamar itu sofanya perlu diperbaiki karena sudah kosong di tengah, jadi untuk rebahan bersantai sudah tidak nyaman. Pada tengah itu kolam renang dingin sekali karena angin yang cukup kencang dan cuaca yang cukup dingin. Petugas jaga juga bilang kalau baru kali itu cuaca sangat dingin... tapi ada salah satu kolam anak yang dialiri air hangat... jadi anak-anak tetap bisa main. Sayang kolam tersebut cukup dalam untuk anak saya usia 3 tahun... Kolam yang satunya lebih dangkal namun tidak ada aliran air hangatnya. Jadi anak saya yang kecil hanya main di playground dekat kolam renang... so far lumayan menginap di el royal.

translated_text: thank god, on the first day the independent type was full, so i got a free upgrade at the condotel, got room 1043. but on the second day (new booking and price difference of 120 thousand) i asked if it was ready for the independent type so i had to move. then the fo gave me the alternative of paying 200 thousand to stay at the condotel, so i stayed at the condotel. if you're in a condotel, because the model is like an apartment, the rooms are quite spacious... there's a bathtub... and there's a sofa. only in that room did the sofa need to be repaired because it was empty in the middle, so lying down and relaxing was no longer comfortable. in the middle, the swimming pool was very cold because the wind was quite strong and the weather was quite cold. the officer on duty also said that this time the weather was very cold... but there was one of the children's pools which had warm water flowing... so the children could still play. unfortunately the pool is deep enough for my 3 year old child... the other pool is shallower but there is no warm water flow. so my small child only plays on the playground near the swimming pool... so far my stay at el royal is quite good.

text: The hotel was old but has its own charm. A bit crowded when check in (since it is a long weekend). Room was pretty standard, with small bathroom (expect a bigger one since it has bathtub). The room was not completely sound proof, I can hear people walking and talking in the corridor (and sometimes kids screaming or crying). Didn’t try the breakfast (actually it is a good thing because when I want to check out, I saw a not healthy amount of people crowding the restaurant, makes me wonder about the health protocol). Also, the elevator is limited, I can’t take the elevator to go to lobby when it’s still breakfast time since people from upper floor was taking it first before come to our floor (decided to take on emergency stairs instead).

text: Kali kedua kesini, overall menyenangkan, petugasnya ramah-ramah, kondisi hotelnya weekend rame banget. Minusnya kebersihan lantai masih kurang, kali pertama dulu lantai kurang bersih, kemaren pun saya menemukan kacamata & kotaknya dikolong tempat tidur, sepertinya punya tamu sebelumnya. Jadi parno tentang kebersihannya, kalo benda yang lumayan besar saja tadi terlihat oleh housekeepingnya. Mohon ditingkatkan kebersihannya ya el royal, pandemi gini mohon memberikan rasa nyaman dan aman ke konsumen. Anyway terima kasih traveloka.

text: Ini kedua kalinya saya dan mama saya menginap di El Royale Bandung, bedanya kali ini tipe yang saya pilih lembong kebetulan penuh karena bertepatan dengan beberapa grup rombongan meeting kantor jadi menurut staff resepsionis tipe kamar saya di ppgrade ke tipe condotel tanpa ada penambahan biaya apapun. Saya berpikir selama masih dengan fasilitas sarapan untuk 2 orang sesuai pesanan di awal saya tidak masalah. Proses check in cukup lancar secara data nama saya sudah terdaftar dan saya tidak membawa kendaraan pribadi. Sampai di kamar memang tipe condotel ini berbeda dengan lembong, di condotel ini ada meja makan dan kursi, lalu wastafel ada 2 yaitu untuk cuci tangan berhadapan dengan kaca dan untuk cuci gelas atau piring berseberangan dengan teko pemanas yang disediakan untuk minum panas. Kamar cukup luas dengan sofa yang nyaman empuk. Sayangnya, kasurnya keras, kurang nyaman saja dan ujung tempat tidur ada kayu yang selalu berbenturan dengan kaki atau tulang kering jadi pasti sakit. Kondisi lampu baik, AC sangat berfungsi dengan baik, toilet rapi, bersih. Tersedia ATM center, Minimart 24 jam. Satu yang saya suka dari El Royale adalah variasi makanan breakfast yang baik dan cocok dengan lidah saya, baik dari roti, telur, snack, main course dan dessert nya baik. Tersedia kolam renang yang cukup luas dan suasana cuaca mendukung walapun berangin. Terima kasih untuk pelayanannya. Ditingkatkan untuk kebersihan dan kualitas fasilitasnya.

translated_text: this is the second time my mother and i have stayed at el royale bandung, the difference is that this time the type i chose, lembong, happened to be full because it coincided with several groups of office meeting groups, so according to the reception staff, my room type was upgraded to the condotel type without any additional costs. i think as long as there are breakfast facilities for 2 people according to the initial order, i don't have a problem. the check-in process was quite smooth, as my name was registered and i didn't bring a private vehicle. arriving at the room, this type of condotel is different from lembong, in this condotel there is a dining table and chairs, then there are 2 sinks, namely for washing hands opposite the glass and for washing glasses or plates opposite the heating kettle provided for hot drinking. the room is quite spacious with a comfortable, soft sofa. unfortunately, the mattress was hard, not very comfortable and there was wood at the end of the bed which always collided with your feet or shins so it definitely hurt. the lights are in good condition, the ac functions very well, the toilets are neat, clean. available atm center, minimart 24 hours. one thing i like about el royale is the variety of breakfast food which is good and suits my taste buds, including bread, eggs, snacks, main courses and good desserts. there is a fairly large swimming pool and the weather conditions are favorable even though it is windy. thank you for the service. improved cleanliness and quality of facilities.

text: El royale termasuk hotel lama walaupun kami menginap di bagian service Apartement nya. Pas masuk ke kamar yang seharusnya non smoking tercium bau rokok sehingga kami meminta staff hotel untuk menyemprotnya dengan pengharum ruangan. Salah satu yang jadi catatan kami tentu saja lift nya yang cukup jadul dengan control system yang sudah out date sehingga membuat pelayanan lift menjadi sedikit lebih lama, ini dikarenakan sistem transportasi lift nya masih system lama. Untuk sarapan variasinya cukup banyak cuma kurang muatan lokalnya, ada sih beberapa kali saya liat Soto Bandung ataupun Surabi. Rasa makanan perlu ditingkatkan plus variasi minuman juga perlu di tambah. Untuk ukuran luas kamar no complaint termasuk yang luas dan sangat mengakomodasi kami yang bertiga, kamar mandi cukup lumayan walau terlihat jadul, dengan ukuran bathtub yang kurang besar sih kalo menurut kami. Lokasi cukup strategis, walking distance ke Braga dan alun-alun cuma kalau hujan memang agak report, susah jalan ke sana dengan berjalan kaki. Staff hotel cukup ramah dan membantu. Overall cukup menyenangkan untuk tinggal di hotel ini.

translated_text: el royale is an old hotel even though we stayed in the service apartment. when we entered the room which was supposed to be non-smoking, we smelled of cigarettes so we asked the hotel staff to spray it with air freshener. one of the things we note is of course that the lift is quite old school with a control system that is out of date, which makes the lift service take a little longer, this is because the lift transportation system is still an old system. there are quite a lot of variations for breakfast, but the local content is lacking, i have seen soto bandung or surabi several times. the taste of food needs to be improved plus the variety of drinks also needs to be increased. as for the size of the no complaints room, it was spacious and very accommodating for the three of us, the bathroom was quite good even though it looked old school, with the size of the bathtub not being big enough in our opinion. the location is quite strategic, walking distance to braga and the main square, but if it rains it's a bit of a problem, it's hard to get there on foot. the hotel staff is quite friendly and helpful. overall it was quite pleasant to stay at this hotel.

text: Pesan via aplikasi 2 minggu sebelumnya. Pesan condotel studio king begitu check in dikasih pasundan suite, karena sedang proses renovasi. Karena datang juga sudah lumayan malam, badan butuh segera istirahat. Jadi kami iya kan saja. Awalnya sih senang aja bisa naik kelas, begitu sampai kamar memang untuk kamar tipe seperti apartment dengan 2 kamar tidur (1 kamar utama, 1 kamar tambahan). Toilet pun 2 (di dalam kamar dan luar), living room dan kitchen. Cuma sayangnya karena bawa 2 anak kecil, rencana kami pesan dengan kasur king size. Tapi di kamar cuma ada 1 kasur queen size dan 1 kasur single size (yang ukuran ini kami tidak pakai karena beda ruangan). Dan memang untuk kamar ini mungkin belum upgrade, jadi untuk suasana kamar sedikit jadul sih. Alhasil malem itu kurang nyaman aja untuk istirahat.... Untuk breakfast, memang menunya banyak dan untuk rasa juga lumayan cocok sih.... Sarapannya dijadwal jamnya saat kita check ini (mungkin supaya tidak berbarengan dan terlalu penuh di restonya).

text: Pengalaman pertama staycation di El Hotel ini semuanya cukup. Kamar cukup luasnya, interior kamar cukup bagusnya (ada beberapa yg berumur) dan kebersihannya juga cukup. Nilai plus nya ada lemari es kecil di rate 5xx an dan dapat sofa bed yang besar (bisa untuk tidur orang dewasa). Breakfast (sarapan) variannya cukup banyak, walau tidak sebanyak hotel langganan saya. Dan untuk rasa so so (lumayan) cenderung enak sedikit tapi tidak ada yang spesial. Penilaian yang lebih dari cukup (cenderung baik) adalah parkir yang luas, proses check in dan out yang cepat dan kolam renang yang luas, nyaman dan hangat. Akan masuk pertimbangan saya ketika liburan di Bandung nanti. Penilaian ini tidak bisa dijadikan patokan, member mungkin akan mengalami pengalaman yang berbeda. Selamat berlibut untuk member semua.

translated_text: the first experience of a staycation at el hotel is everything is enough. the rooms are quite spacious, the room interiors are quite good (some are old) and the cleanliness is also sufficient. the plus point is that there is a small refrigerator at the 5xx rate and you can get a large sofa bed (can sleep for adults). there are quite a lot of breakfast variants, although not as many as at my regular hotel. and the taste is so so (not bad) tends to be a little tasty but nothing special. the assessment that is more than adequate (tends to be good) is ample parking, a fast check-in and out process and a large, comfortable and warm swimming pool. i will take it into consideration when i go on holiday in bandung. this assessment cannot be used as a benchmark, members may experience different experiences. happy holidays to all members.

text: Menginap disini di Awal februari 2021 dalam rangka staycation dengan keluarga. Memilih Hotel El Royal tentunya bukan tanpa alasan, krn membawa 6 orang anak kecil so pasti fasilitas kolam renang Air Hangat lah yang dicari. Alhamdulillah kolam renangnya sudah buka, protokol kesehatan pun di jaga ketat di wilayah ini, jd harus pakai baju renang. Tidak boleh memakai kaos biasa. Apabila tidak pakai baju renang, untuk yg cowo bisa hanya memakai celana biasa yg khusus dipakai dikolam renang. 1 kamar dapat jatah pinjaman 2 handuk dan pemakaian 1 loker. Air kolamnya bersih. Anak-anak sangat senang dan bahagia bermain disana. Kolam renangnya berada di lantai 3 yang ternyata ada mesjid juga di sana. AL Mubaligh namanya, tidak terlalu besar, tapi bersih dan nuansa hijau segar. Sundanesse Hospitality memang cocok disandang Hotel ini, karena Nuansa sundanya kental terlihat di seragam Karyawannya, interior hotel yg banyak memajang Wayang golek dan ternyata ada tradisional life music pada saat breakfast, saya kaget kirain itu suara kaset ternyata di lobby ada Seniman Asli yg tengah memainkan berbagai macam alat music tradisional Jawa Barat. Suka deh...Pas lagi liat kesana, Anak saya juga boleh mencoba saron yg pernah sedikit dia pelajari disekolah. Di Lobby juga tersedia penyewaan sepeda yg harganya 75rb/jam. Tapi saya tidak pakai, karena bawa pasukan krucils 6 orang, susah ngaturnya, jadi jalan pagi saja ke Braga di pagi hari, karena dekat dengan lokasi hotel. Breakfast nya enak dan lengkap. Walaupun kondisi pandemi, tetap menyajikan masakan yg beraneka ragam. Nasi goreng, mie goreng dan pudingnya juara deh. Oh ya kita tidak mengambil makanan secara langsung, tp ada karyawan yang mengambilkan makananya tepat di depan lauk pauk dan minuman yg tersedia. Restoran nya luas dan Indah.posisi meja disesuaikan dengan protokol kesehatan yaitu dgn jarak yg sudah ditentukan. Secara keseluruhan, hotel ini sangat baik dalam menerapkannya , mulai dari pintu masuk, restoran bahkan di kolam renangnya. pelayanannya pun cepat dan sigap, pada saat kloset bocor, petugasnya pun tidak lama datang setelah laporan. Lantai kotor akibat anak anak makannya belepotan pun bisa cepat dibersihkan setelah menit tolong ke hotel dan itu tanpa ada tambahan biaya loh... Keren kan. Tapi untuk minta tambahan selimut, handuk dan bantal ada kena biaya lagi, wajar kok. Overall, kami sekeluarga puas dengan hotel ini. Sangat direkomendasikan untuk yg mau liburan keluaga. Terimakasih Hotel EL ROYAL.. Terimakasih Traveloka...

renang air hangat lah yang dicari. alhamdulillah kolam renangnya sudah buka, protokol kesehatan pun di jaga ketat di wilayah ini, jd harus pakai baju renang. tidak boleh memakai kaos biasa. apabila tidak pakai baju renang, untuk yg cowo bisa hanya memakai celana biasa yg khusus dipakai dikolam renang. 1 kamar dapat jatah pinjaman 2 handuk dan pemakaian 1 loker. air kolamnya bersih. anak-anak sangat senang dan bahagia bermain disana. kolam renangnya berada di lantai 3 yang ternyata ada mesjid juga di sana. al mubaligh namanya, tidak terlalu besar, tapi bersih dan nuansa hijau segar. sundanesse hospitality memang cocok disandang hotel ini, karena nuansa sundanya kental terlihat di seragam karyawannya, interior hotel yg banyak memajang wayang golek dan ternyata ada tradisional life music pada saat breakfast, saya kaget kirain itu suara kaset ternyata di lobby ada seniman asli yg tengah memainkan berbagai macam alat music tradisional jawa barat. suka deh...pas lagi liat kesana, anak saya juga boleh mencoba saron yg pernah sedikit dia pelajari disekolah. di lobby juga tersedia penyewaan sepeda yg harganya 75rb/jam. tapi saya tidak pakai, karena bawa pasukan krucils 6 orang, susah ngaturnya, jadi jalan pagi saja ke braga di pagi hari, karena dekat dengan lokasi hotel. breakfast nya enak dan lengkap. walaupun kondisi pandemi, tetap menyajikan masakan yg beraneka ragam. nasi goreng, mie goreng dan pudingnya juara deh. oh ya kita tidak mengambil makanan secara langsung, tp ada karyawan yang mengambilkan makananya tepat di depan lauk pauk dan minuman yg tersedia. restoran nya luas dan indah.posisi meja disesuaikan dengan protokol kesehatan yaitu dgn jarak yg sudah ditentukan. secara keseluruhan, hotel ini sangat baik dalam menerapkannya , mulai dari pintu masuk, restoran bahkan di kolam renangnya. pelayanannya pun cepat dan sigap, pada saat kloset bocor, petugasnya pun tidak lama datang setelah laporan. lantai kotor akibat anak anak makannya belepotan pun bisa cepat dibersihkan setelah menit tolong ke hotel dan itu tanpa ada tambahan biaya loh... keren kan. tapi untuk minta tambahan selimut, handuk dan bantal ada kena biaya lagi, wajar kok. overall, kami sekeluarga puas dengan hotel ini. sangat direkomendasikan untuk yg mau liburan keluaga. terimakasih hotel el royal.. terimakasih traveloka...
translated_text: stayed here at the beginning of february 2021 for a staycation with family. choosing the el royal hotel was certainly not without reason, because you were bringing 6 small children so you were definitely looking for a warm water swimming pool facility. thank god the swimming pool is open, health protocols are strictly maintained in this area, so you have to wear a swimsuit. can't wear regular t-shirts. if you don't wear a swimsuit, guys can just wear regular pants that are specifically worn in swimming pools. for 1 room you can borrow 2 towels and use 1 locker. the pool water is clean. the children were very happy and happy playing there. the swimming pool is on the 3rd floor which turns out there is a mosque there too. al mubaligh is its name, not too big, but clean and with a fresh green feel. sundanese hospitality is indeed suitable for this hotel, because the sundanese nuance can be seen clearly in the employee uniforms, the interior of the hotel has many displays of wayang golek and it turns out there is traditional life music at breakfast, i was surprised i thought it was the sound of cassette tapes but in the lobby there were native artists playing various various types of traditional west javanese musical instruments. i really like it... when i saw it there, my child was also able to try saron which he had learned a little about at school. in the lobby there is also bicycle rental available which costs 75 thousand/hour. but i didn't use it, because i brought a crew of 6 people, it was difficult to manage, so i just walked to braga in the morning, because it was close to the hotel location. the breakfast is delicious and complete. despite the pandemic conditions, it still serves a variety of dishes. the fried rice, fried noodles and pudding are champions. oh yes, we don't pick up the food directly, but there are employees who pick up the food right in front of the side dishes and drinks that are available. the restaurant is spacious and beautiful. table positions are adjusted to health protocols, namely at a predetermined distance. overall, this hotel is very good at implementing it, starting from the entrance, restaurant and even the swimming pool. the service was fast and alert, when the toilet leaked, the officers didn't take long to arrive after reporting it. dirty floors caused by children's messy eating can also be cleaned quickly after a minute or two when you go to the hotel and that's without any additional costs... cool, right? but to ask for additional blankets, towels and pillows there is another fee, which is normal. overall, our family is satisfied with this hotel. highly recommended for those who want a family holiday. thank you hotel el royal... thank you traveloka...

text: Hotel dengan area parkir yang cukup luas, sudah pasti karena ada apartemennya juga. Saat memasuki lobi, terasa kesan tua yang mewah, dengan pencahayaan kuning yang lembut menaungi wilayah lobi yang luas, dan disediakan lusinan bangku dan meja, seperti ruang tamu berganda. Malam pertama, saya menginap di Lembong Room, dan saya suka ruangan ini. Perpaduan warna abu-abu dan beige serta lantai vinyl kayu membuat kamar ini hangat dan elegan, disokong oleh perabotan yang sepertinya baru dan bersih. Malam kedua, saya upgrade ke kamar Condotel agar bisa dapat bathtub. Kamar ini beda tower dengan Lembong Room dan posisinya di lantai atas, sehingga bisa melihat city view. Tapi saya kecewa, karena dekorasi dan suasana kamar justru tidak sebagus Lembong Room, hanya unggul di bathtub saja, dan wastafelnya ada di luar kamar mandi. Saya bertanya-tanya kenapa ada 2 wastafel, di dalam 1 kamar, tapi mungkin karena ini konsepnya condominium hotel, jadi semacam ada kitchen set, dengan banyak laci, dan tempat cuci piring, namun tanpa kompor saja. Kamar ini benar-benar terkesan tua dan suram, tapi saya suka dengan sofa panjangnya yang empuk. Kolam renangnya juga luas dan ada kolam jacuzzi. Di are kolam renang disediakan handuk dan bisa pinjam loker untuk menyimpan barang- barang pribadi. Lokasi hotelnya dekat dengan Braga dan ada di pusat kota. Untuk pelayanannya biasa saja, dan harganya agak mahal jika dibandingkan dengan pengalaman menginap saya di sini.

translated_text: a hotel with a fairly large parking area, of course because there are apartments too. when entering the lobby, it feels old and luxurious, with soft yellow lighting covering the spacious lobby area, and dozens of benches and tables, like a double living room. the first night, i stayed in the lembong room, and i liked this room. the combination of gray and beige colors and wood vinyl flooring make this room warm and elegant, supported by furniture that looks new and clean. the second night, i upgraded to a condotel room so i could have a bathtub. this room is a different tower from the lembong room and is positioned on the top floor, so you can see the city view. but i was disappointed, because the decoration and atmosphere of the room were not as good as the lembong room, only the bathtub excelled, and the sink was outside the bathroom. i was wondering why there were 2 sinks in 1 room, but maybe because this is a condominium hotel concept, so it's like there's a kitchen set, with lots of drawers and a dishwasher, but without a stove. this room really looks old and gloomy, but i like the long, soft sofa. the swimming pool is also spacious and there is a jacuzzi pool. in the swimming pool area, towels are provided and you can borrow lockers to store personal items. the hotel location is close to braga and in the city center. the service is ordinary, and the price is a bit expensive compared to my experience of staying here.

translated_text: very satisfied with staying 2 nights at el hotel royale bandung, the rooms were clean and the facilities were okay. the children really enjoyed soaking in the bathtub even though they had already gone swimming under it before 😅. the breakfast menu is really good, there are lots of choices and everything tastes delicious. 🤩 oh yes, in the lobby there is live gamelan music which is melodious, it feels like being in the hut, it makes you hungry all over 🤭🤣 well, in the lobby there is also a fish pond, the fish are beautiful, my son also likes hanging out there. overall, our family and i were very satisfied staying here. next time we go to bandung, i definitely want to stay here again 😍 oh yes, yesterday we stayed in the ros executive room, i asked for an extra bed so i checked in for one room for 3 guests and 3 breakfasts. well, my husband and i were staying overnight plus our 3 young children 🤭, i thought i would get extra for breakfast but it turns out there weren't any additional costs, you know. it's not bad so you can buy more souvenirs 😁

text: Check in nya sangat mudah dan cepat cuma perlu KTP doang. Kamarnya besar, bersih, untuk harga segitu termasuk murah dapet fasilitas kamar yang diatas rata-rata, kasurnya besar (kami pilih yang single bed), ada meja makan, ada banyak banget lemari (laci), ada kulkas kecil, kamar mandinya agak kecil tapi dapet bathtub, kami pesan view nya menghadap kolam renang. Posisi hotel dekat dengan jalan braga, kami jalan kaki untuk makan malam di sekitaran braga. Sarapan paginya anak saya kena charge 75 ribu, karena memang kupon makanya hanya untuk 2orang, (1-5thn free), makannya banyak pilihan, rasanya enak, petugas makan pun sigap, di isi ulang sebelum makanannya habis. Secara keseluruhan untuk harga 1 malam, saya dapet banyak kemewahan dari el royale hotel bandung. Makasih traveloka.

translated_text: checking in is very easy and fast, you only need an id card. the room is big, clean, for that price it's relatively cheap to get room facilities that are above average, the bed is big (we chose a single bed), there's a dining table, there are lots of cupboards (drawers), there's a small refrigerator, the bathroom is a bit small but got a bathtub, we ordered the view facing the swimming pool. the hotel's position is close to jalan braga, we walked for dinner around braga. my child was charged 75 thousand for breakfast in the morning, because it was a coupon so it was only for 2 people, (1-5 years free), there were many choices of food, it tasted delicious, the food attendant was alert, refilled before the food ran out. overall, for the price of 1 night, i got a lot of luxury from el royale hotel bandung. thanks traveloka.

Sarapan kebetulan penuh jadi duduk makan dengan orang asing, sedikit tidak nyaman karena mereka ngobrol politik dan lain-lain dengan suara keras. text: Pengalaman saya menginap di El Royale cukup menyenangkan. Ruangannya luas, kamar bersih dan nyaman. Menu sarapan enak dan sangat variatif. Kolam renang luas. Lokasi cukup strategis. Parkir cukup luas. Petugasnya ramah dan helpful. Hanya saja, akses dari parkir ke lobi kurang OK untuk orang/anak difable yang menggunakan kursi roda atau stroller karena dari lift menuju lobi tidak ada jalur untuk roda. Kamarnya kurang kedap, suara orang ngobrol di dalam kamar saja bisa terdengar ke luar dan ke kamar sebelah (kebetulan saya pesan 2 kamar, bersebelahan). Air di salah satu kamar yang kami tempati keruh sehingga membuat kulit menjadi gatal, tapi pihak manajemen telah menangani keluhan ini dengan baik, kamar kami dipindahkan ke kamar lain yang lebih baik, airnya tidak keruh. Informasi di website perlu diperbaharui. Sauna sudah tidak ada. Kolam anak, jacuzzi, kolam dewasa, semua berada di 1 lokasi outdoor. But overall saya merasa puas dan senang dengan hotel El Royale, kapan-kapan insya Allah akan kembali lagi. Terima kasih.

translated_text: my experience staying at el royale was quite pleasant. the room is spacious, the rooms are clean and comfortable. the breakfast menu is delicious and very varied. spacious swimming pool. quite strategic location. parking is quite spacious. the officers are friendly and helpful. however, access from the parking lot to the lobby is not good for disabled people/children who use wheelchairs or strollers because from the lift to the lobby there is no path for wheels. the room was not soundproof, the sound of people chatting in the room could be heard outside and into the next room (i happened to order 2 rooms, next to each other). the water in one of the rooms we stayed in was cloudy so it made the skin itchy, but the management had handled this complaint well, our room was moved to another room which was better, the water was not cloudy. the information on the website needs to be updated. the sauna is no longer there. children's pool, jacuzzi, adult pool, all in 1 outdoor location. but overall i feel satisfied and happy with the el royale hotel, sometime god willing, i will come back again. thank you.

text: Kami sekeluarga menginap 2 malam. Saat check in kami up grade kamar dari merdeka twin ke deluxe condotel. Karena kami lihat kondisi kamar merdeka twin yang kami dapat kurang nyaman, seperti lembab dan terlihat tua. Secara umum kondisi sesuai dengan tarif. Tapi memang kondisi kamar, terutama seperti merdeka twin (saya tidak tau kondisi kamar yang lain) perlu direnovasi, karena sudah tua. Untuk deluxe condotel yang kami tempati pun, tercium bau tidak enak dari lubang pembuangan airnya. Memang sekarang ini seperti saya lihat sedang ada perbaikan disana sini, sehingga kenyamanan agak sedikit terganggu, terutama dengan lift yang menghubungkan area parkir dengan lobbi utama. Ini karena baru peralihan dari grand panghegar ke el royale, mudah-mudahan kedepan akan lebih nyaman.

text: Semuanya baik-baik saja sampai saya menemukan ruang bawah tanah sangat sempit untuk mobil. Ya itu masih dapat diakses tetapi saya pikir agak tidak pantas untuk hotel bintang 4. Selanjutnya, saya ingin mengkritisi kebijakan kamar merokok dan bebas rokok. Meja depan memberi tahu saya bahwa mereka memiliki kebijakan yang mengatakan bahwa kamar akan dalam mode merokok pada hari kerja dan mode bebas rokok pada akhir pekan. Percaya itu harus menjadi cara yang lebih baik untuk memisahkan dengan jelas kamar mana yang merokok mana yang tidak. Juga, harap tingkatkan sistem keamanan karena lift tidak memiliki akses khusus untuk penghuni. Setiap orang, memiliki atau tidak memiliki kartu akses dapat dengan mudah melakukan perjalanan dari lantai ke lantai. Masalah kecil ditemukan di tempat sampah di dalam kamar mandi. Untungnya, staf dapat menyelesaikannya meskipun butuh waktu lama untuk kasus kecil namun mudah (saya bahkan dapat memperbaikinya sendiri). Secara keseluruhan, saya masih memiliki pengalaman menginap yang menyenangkan di El Royale, bernilai bintang 4 dari saya. Buktikan bahwa kalian dapat meningkatkan pengalaman tamu yang lebih baik!

translated_text: everything was fine until i discovered the basement was very narrow for the car. yes it is still accessible but i think it is a bit inappropriate for a 4 star hotel. next, i would like to criticize the smoking and non-smoking room policy. the front desk told me that they have a policy that says the rooms will be in smoking mode on weekdays and non-smoking mode on weekends. believe it should be a better way to clearly separate which rooms are smoking and which are not. also, please improve the security system because the lift does not have special access for residents. everyone, whether they have an access card or not, can easily travel from floor to floor. a small problem was found in the trash can inside the bathroom. fortunately, the staff was able to solve it even though it took a long time for a small but easy case (i was even able to fix it myself). overall, i still had a great stay at el royale, worth 4 stars from me. prove that you can improve the guest experience better!

text: Ini adalah kedua kami menginap di el royale Bandung. Itu menyenangkan dan memuaskan. Para staf dipersilakan, proses check-in cepat. Suasana luar biasa di area selasar. Sarapannya enak dan lezat, aneka makanan lokal dan internasional. Kolam renang luar biasa, air hangat, jacuzzi, anak saya menyukainya. Itu salah satu alasan kami mengapa kami kembali ke el royale. Tempat parkir luas di ruang bawah tanah. Ruangan itu sesuai permintaan kami, lantai bebas rokok dan tidak hanya kamar bebas rokok. Sangat bagus! Meskipun ruangan itu nyaman dan luas, saya pikir inilah saatnya untuk mengganti furnitur dan aksesori kamar. 2 lampu tidur kami rusak di kamar 328. Toilet perlu pembersih ekstra di area bak mandi dan wastafel. Fasilitasnya lengkap, sprei qas bersih dan segar. Ruang makan ramai dan membutuhkan lebih banyak ruang, terutama pada akhir minggu dan musim liburan. Kami barelly tidak mendapatkan meja, perlu menunggu 10 menit untuk mendapatkannya. Secara keseluruhan itu adalah kesenangan dan pasti akan kembali lagi dan menginap di eL Royale.
clean_text: ini adalah kedua kami menginap di el royale bandung. itu menyenangkan dan memuaskan. para staf dipersilakan, proses check-in cepat. suasana luar biasa di area selasar. sarapannya enak dan lezat, aneka makanan lokal dan internasional. kolam renang luar biasa, air hangat, jacuzzi, anak saya menyukainya. itu salah satu alasan kami mengapa kami kembali ke el royale. tempat parkir luas di ruang bawah tanah. ruangan itu sesuai permintaan kami, lantai bebas rokok dan tidak hanya kamar bebas rokok. sangat bagus! meskipun ruangan itu nyaman dan luas, saya pikir inilah saatnya untuk mengganti furnitur dan aksesori kamar. 2 lampu tidur kami rusak di kamar 328. toilet perlu pembersih ekstra di area bak mandi dan wastafel. fasilitasnya lengkap, sprei qas bersih dan segar. ruang makan ramai dan membutuhkan lebih banyak ruang, terutama pada akhir minggu dan musim liburan. kami barelly tidak mendapatkan meja, perlu menunggu 10 menit untuk mendapatkannya. secara keseluruhan itu adalah kesenangan dan pasti akan kembali lagi dan menginap di el royale.
translated_text: this is our second stay at el royale bandung. it's fun and satisfying. the staff are welcome, the check-in process is fast. great atmosphere in the lobby area. the breakfast is delicious and delicious, a variety of local and international food. amazing swimming pool, warm water, jacuzzi, my son loved it. that's one of the reasons why we come back to el royale. ample parking space in the basement. the room was according to our request, non-smoking floor and not just a non-smoking room. very good! even though the room was comfortable and spacious, i thought it was time to change the furniture and room accessories. our 2 bedroom lamps were broken in room 328. the toilet needed extra cleaning in the tub and sink area. the facilities are complete, the qas bed linen is clean and fresh. the dining room is crowded and requires more space, especially on weekends and holiday seasons. we barrelly didn't get a table, needed to wait 10 minutes to get one. overall it was a pleasure and would definitely come back and stay at el royale.

text: Positif: kami booking pasundan suite yang ternyata adalah unit apartemen 2 kamar tidur dah 2 kamar mandi. Agak berbeda dengan foto dan detail kamar saat booking yang menunjukkan 1 kamar dengan 1 double bed dan 1 single bed. Unit cukup bersih. Amenities komplit. Sarapan: soto kikil rasanya cukup enak. Negatif: kamar 761 menghadap rel kereta api, jadi tiap jam minimal ada 1x bunyi klakson kereta api (kecuali antara jam 11 malam sd 3 pagi saya ketiduran karena lelah) Suara dengung yang sangat mengganggu di kamar utama (kemungkinan dari unit outdoor AC di balkon) sepanjang kami menempati kamar. Karena kami check in sudah larut malam dan juga sudah lelah plus sudah selesai mandi, kami tidak minta pindah kamar dengan harapan dengungnya sementara. Ternyata hanya berhenti selama 3-5 menit untuk kemudian mulai berdengung lagi. Handuk sudah rusak tepiannya. Saran: alangkah baik jika handuk rusak diperbaiki dulu sebelum digunakan untuk tamu.

translated_text: positive: we booked the pasundan suite which turned out to be a 2 bedroom and 2 bathroom apartment unit. slightly different from the photos and room details when booking which shows 1 room with 1 double bed and 1 single bed. the unit is quite clean. complete amenities. breakfast: soto kikil tastes quite good. negative: room 761 faces the train tracks, so every hour there is at least 1 train horn sound (except between 11 pm and 3 am i fell asleep because i was tired) a very annoying buzzing sound in the main room (possibly from the outdoor ac unit on the balcony) as long as we occupy the room. because we checked in late at night and were tired plus we had finished showering, we didn't ask to move rooms in the hope that the buzzing would be temporary. apparently it only stopped for 3-5 minutes and then started buzzing again. the edges of the towel were damaged. suggestion: it would be better if damaged towels were repaired first before using them for guests.

translated_text: 1. arrived at the hotel at 12 noon to check in, then went straight for lunch, returned to the hotel at 15. requested a slice of birthday cake for my parents to be provided in the room before entering the room, but when i entered the room there wasn't any and had to i called the operator first, even though when i checked in i had requested it and it was answered by the officer (and i had already paid for the slice of cake 1 day before checking in). 2. if you want to have breakfast, queue up and wait on the list first, the reason is that the restaurant staff is always overloaded every weekend. then if it's like this there's no follow-up so it doesn't happen again. if you want to have breakfast in a 4 star hotel, you have to wait on a waiting list. 3. there is little variation in the breakfast menu for 4 star hotels. 4. clean rooms, fast check-in and check-out process. 5. the reception desk (when i checked in) was really messy, papers were scattered on the table, piles of items (perhaps left by customers) were not arranged neatly.

text: Hotel ini cocok untuk staycation. Saya pilih condotel studio. Kamarnya nyaman, amenities lengkap, kamar mandi ada bath tubnya dan ada di lantai 18. Wifi juga bagus cuma channel tv tidak begitu banyak, tapi cukuplah. Ada swimming pool juga. Hanya 1 yang membuat saya tidak nyaman, yaitu pada saat breakfast. Petugas di bagian dessert tidak ramah, saya ingin makan bread pudding, saya minta ditambah 1 potong lagi karena dimakan berdua dengan anak saya, jadi. 3 potong untuk dimakan berdua. Tapi dia langsung melihat saya dengan judes dan seperti tidak mau memberi lagi. Padahal saya lihat tamu-tamu lain diberi 2 potong padahal untuk dimakan sendiri. Baru pertama kali saya mengalami kejadian seperti ini pada saat staycation. Tolong hospitality petugas yang ini lebih ditingkatkan lagi. Maaf jika mungkin saya terlalu berlebihan.

translated_text: this hotel is suitable for a staycation. i chose the studio condotel. the rooms are comfortable, complete with amenities, the bathroom has a bath tub and is on the 18th floor. wifi is also good but there are not that many tv channels, but it's enough. there is a swimming pool too. only 1 thing made me uncomfortable, namely at breakfast. the clerk at the dessert section was not friendly, i wanted to eat bread pudding, i asked for 1 more piece because i was eating it together with my child, so... 3 pieces for two to eat. but he immediately looked at me bitchily and seemed like he didn't want to give me any more. even though i saw other guests being given 2 pieces even though they were for themselves to eat. this is the first time i have experienced something like this during a staycation. please improve the hospitality of this officer further. sorry if maybe i'm overreacting.

translated_text: an old hotel that is still well maintained. it feels luxurious. the hotel lobby is very spacious and has a comfortable atmosphere. deluxe twin room on 4th floor: comfortable, quite spacious. the twin bedrooms are large and can be put together. it's just a shame to get a room on the 4th floor which faces jalan merdeka, the room is not very soundproof, the noise from vehicles on the road is very audible, especially the noise from motorbikes, you can still hear it until dawn. makes sleeping uncomfortable. suggestion: can be fixed on the side of the window seal or damper. the bathroom is clean and the toiletries available are only too small so it's a bit cramped, there is a hair dryer installed, there are 2 towels, clean. tissue available, coffee tea sachets, tissue, water heater kettle, get 2 bottles of 600ml aqua. there is a mini refrigerator. the cupboard is an open model with no doors, only 2 clothes hangers are available, very few. there are tables and chairs for just working. there are several power sockets, but it's best to just bring an extender. tv uses 43 inch led and lots of channels from indihome, clear picture. wifi in the night test can be 6-7 mbps. parking is in the basement. the restaurant is on the ground floor and an additional restaurant is on the swimming pool area on the 4th floor. the menu is quite varied and tastes delicious.

text: Hotel ini fav banget dan udah terhitung sering kita staycation. Hotelnya sangat nyaman dan betul² tidak mengecewakan, tapi untuk pertama kali nya ngerasa kurang puas. Yang pertama, ada driver gojeg mengantarkan bubur pesanan saya, karena kunci akses naik ke kamar cuma 1 dan pernah aku terjebak di lift akhirnya saya minta tolong receiptionis untuk meminta tolong bellboy untuk mengantar ke kamar tetapi kondisi bellboy nya banyak yang tidak ada di tempat dan yang ke 2 miscommunication antara front office dan bagian restaurant. Saat cek-in di karenakan untuk breakfast nya di antar ke kamar, saya meminta makanan di antar jam 7pagi dan saya konfirmasi berkali-kali karena saya bawa anak agar jam makan anak g terlewat. Ternyata sampe jam 7.40 makanan belum di antar, maka saya telpon ke front office menanyakan makanan tetapi katanya dalam antrian. Sampai jam 7.55 makanan juga belum di antar maka saya telpon ke bagian restaurant dan ternyata setelah di crosscheck, ternyata kata bagian restaurant itu jam 08.00 sedangkan jelas-jelas sama minta jam 07.00 dan di voucher pun tertera. Semoga ke depannya tolong diperbaiki. Jika memang untuk jadwal Breakfast penug di jam 07, mohon di konfirmasi kepada customer agar pihak customer menyediakan makanan, apalagi yang membawa anak seperti kami, anak-anak jadi rewel bukan main. Untuk yang laiinya nilai nya 09 dari 10, saya merasa puas

translated_text: this hotel is really a favorite and we have had frequent staycations. the hotel was very comfortable and really didn't disappoint, but for the first time i felt less than satisfied. firstly, there was a gojeg driver who delivered the porridge i ordered, because there was only 1 access key to the room and once i was stuck in the elevator, finally i asked the receptionist to ask the bellboy to take me to the room, but many of the bellboys were not there and the ones 2nd, miscommunication between the front office and the restaurant department. when i checked in, breakfast was to be delivered to my room, i asked for food to be delivered at 7 in the morning and i confirmed it several times because i was bringing children so that the children's meal times wouldn't be missed. it turned out that until 7.40 the food had not been delivered, so i called the front office to ask about the food but they said it was in line. until 7.55, the food had not been delivered, so i called the restaurant department and it turned out that after crosschecking, it turned out that the restaurant department said it was 08.00, even though the same thing clearly asked for 07.00 and the voucher also stated it. hopefully in the future please fix it. if the breakfast schedule is late at 07, please confirm with the customer so that the customer will provide food, especially if you bring children like us, the children get fussy, it's no joke. for the others the score is 09 out of 10, i feel satisfied

text: Sebenarnya kami cukup senang stay 3d2n di sini, hanya ada 1 kejadian yang sedikit mengecewakan. Plus: 1. Kondisi/type kamar sesuai permintaan. 2. Pelayanan check in & check out yang cepat. 3. Hotel yang mempunyai tempat ibadah yang sangat mudah dijangkau, bersih & rapih. 4. Fasilitas cukup lengkap. Minus: 1. Saat saya pulang acara rabu malam dengan ibu & mertua saya yang sudah tua, dan ingin menurunkan mereka dipintu samping seperti yang saya lakukan hari sebelumnya, dan setelah saya berenti membuka pintu buat orangtua kami, saat itu kami dihampiri petugas dengan baju dengan rompi bertulis security yang mengatakan pintu lobby samping saat ini hanya untuk orang penting tersebut, dan kami tidak boleh berenti disitu, padahal hari sebelumnya tidak apa-apa, yang sepertinya mereka sedang berada di ruangan wine, padahal saat itu kondisi lobby samping kosong dan tidak menghalangi kendaraan apapun saat itu juga tidak ada kendaraan mengantri kurang lebih pukul 8an malam, saya sudah katakan hanya ingin menurunkan 2 orang tua kami yang saat itu juga kakinya sedang agak sakit, kebetulan pintu tersebut hanya beberapa langkah ke lift untuk ke kamar, tapi security tersebut tidak peduli dan meminta kami untuk segera jalan, akhirnya kami mengalah untuk menghindari perdebatan. Saya di sini agak kecewa dengan perlakuan tersebut, haruskan memperlakukan tamu/orangtua seperti itu demi reputasi, kami hanya menurunkan orangtua kami sebentar, tanpa mengganggu orang lain. Kami sebagai tamu setidaknya mendapatkan perlakuan yang baik/wajar, biarpun kami bukan orang penting, semoga ke depan bisa lebih baik untuk el hotel, terutama untuk petugas-petugas security/penjaga lobby pintu masuk. 2. Kunci sempat 2x error untuk 2 kamar kami. Semoga bisa diperbaiki lebih baik lagi. Terima kasih el hotel sudah menyediakan tempat yang nyaman untuk kami sekeluarga menginap.

translated_text: actually we were quite happy staying 3d2n here, there was only 1 incident that was a little disappointing. plus: 1. room condition/type according to request. 2. fast check-in & check-out service. 3. hotels that have places of worship that are very easy to reach, clean & tidy. 4. the facilities are quite complete. minus: 1. when i came home from a wednesday night event with my elderly mother & in-laws, and wanted to drop them off at the side door like i did the previous day, and after i stopped opening the door for our parents, at that time we were approached by officers wearing clothes vest with a security note saying that the side lobby door is currently only for important people, and we are not allowed to stop there, even though the previous day it was fine, it looked like they were in the wine room, even though at that time the side lobby was empty and not in the way. at that time there were no vehicles queuing at around 8pm, i said i just wanted to drop off our 2 parents whose legs were a bit sore at that time, coincidentally the door was only a few steps to the lift to get to the room, but the security didn't cared and asked us to move on, we finally gave in to avoid an argument. i'm a bit disappointed here with this treatment, you have to treat guests/parents like that for the sake of reputation, we just put our parents down for a moment, without disturbing other people. we as guests at least get good/reasonable treatment, even though we are not important people, hopefully in the future it will be better for the hotel, especially for the security officers/entrance lobby guards. 2. the keys had errors twice for our 2 rooms. hopefully it can be repaired better. thank you el hotel for providing a comfortable place for our family to stay.

text: Jujur, kalau ke Bandung, el royal adalah pilihan hotel yang pertama dicari karena memang oke& tempatnya strategis, kecuali kalau penuh baru ke tempat lain. Biasanya pilih type deluxe condotel, tapi karena tanggal 2 Desember kemaren full dan hanya sisa type pasundan suite dengan harga 2 jtaan/malam, kami coba cari hotel lain tapi juga full, kalaupun ada kurang oke. Akhirnya diputuskan ambil yang pasundan suite untuk 2 malam. Tadinya mikir dengan type suite sama oke nya dengan yang deluxe condotel, tapi ternyata kali ini sedikit agak mengecewakan, kamar mandi (shower) mengeluarkan bau tak sedap, pinjam setrika pagi bilangnya full dipinjam tamu lain, trus saya bilang agak siangan ga apa-apa tapi ga datang-datang. Air mineral dan peralatan mandi hari berikutnya tidak otomatis diberikan tapi harus diminta, selebihnya tetap oke, proses check in dan check out cepat, receptionis ramah, sarapan juga enak.

translated_text: honestly, if you go to bandung, el royal is the first hotel choice you look for because it's really good & the location is strategic, unless it's full then go somewhere else. usually we choose the deluxe condotel type, but because last december 2 it was full and only the pasundan suite type was left at a price of 2 million/night, we tried to look for another hotel but it was also full, even if there was one it wasn't okay. finally decided to take the pasundan suite for 2 nights. i thought the suite type was just as good as the deluxe condotel, but it turned out this time it was a bit disappointing, the bathroom (shower) gave off a bad smell, i borrowed the iron in the morning and said it was full, borrowed from another guest, then i said it's okay in the afternoon, but didn't come. mineral water and toiletries the next day are not automatically given but must be requested, the rest is still okay, the check in and check out process is fast, the receptionist is friendly, breakfast is also delicious.

text: Saya check in untuk 2 kamar, tetapi ternyata d salah satu kamar masih ada tamunya dan saya complain ke resepsionis dan mereka bilang tidak tau kalo masih ada tamu d kamar tersebut. Lalu saya ditawarkan free upgrade ke type eksekutif. Kamar luas bersih AC dingin. Nginep 2 malam dan kamar dibersihkan. Hanya saja untuk amneties d kamar mandi kurang lengkap ya. Untuk sarapan lumayan lengkap tetapi masih kurang variasi dan rasa. Apalagi menginap 2 malam sarapanny tidak banyak yang dirubah. Semoga kedepanny bisa diperbaiki. Oia liftnya juga lama dan sempet error karena tidak bisa d sensor kartu kamarny dan itu membuat banyak tamu membludak d lantai GF.

Jadi kurang puas. Semoga Bandung lekas pulih dan kita semua sehat. Aamiin.

text: Ini adalah pengalaman menginap yang kedua kali bagi saya dan teman-teman. Kesan pertama sungguh menyenangkan, namun untuk pengalaman kedua ini kami kurang puas akan pelayanannya. Kami datang cek in lebih awal, tapi dua kamar yang kami pesan belum siap. Kami pun menunggu dengan sabar hingga jam 2. Setelah jam 2 lewat, kamar juga belum siap. Tamu lain banyak yang menunggu juga. Saat jam 3 dengan sedikit memaksa, akhirnya kami dapat 1 kamar. Dan kamar kedua siap jam 4.30an. Keesokan paginya, tempat sarapan biasanya dipindahkan, sehingga variasi menu makanan yg disajikan tidak sebanyak biasanya, meskipun rasa tetap terjaga kualitasnya. Sebuah pembelajaran bagi pihak hotel agar bisa mengantisipasi saat jumlah tamu membludak dan gedung hotel dipakai untuk acara wisuda dan lainnya.

Sewa 2 kamar, check-in yang 1 sekitar jam 2 oke lah, kamar kedua saya baru tersedia sekitar jam 3.30 staf oke lah, khususnya staf restoran sangat membantu dan ramah. I'll never come here again for sure, thanks.

clean_text: kamar tipe condotel loft lumayan luas, namun sangat kelihatan dari furnitur dan elektroniknya bahwa kamar ini sudah cukup berumur. air panasnya kadang tidak benar-benar panas. amenities-nya juga standar saja. kecepatan internet? jangan diharapkan. opsi menu sarapan variatif, tapi tidak ada yang menonjol dari segi rasa. ada makanan indonesia dan western juga. cukup oke kalau hal yang cukup mengganggu bagi saya adalah lift yang terbatas. mungkin karena capacity hotel lagi full, tapi tamu-tamu yang membajak lift ini keterlaluan banyaknya. saya jadi harus menunggu lama menggunakan lift karena selalu penuh diisi orang yang mau turun tapi ikut lift yang sedang naik. mungkin perlu ada petugas yang menjaga lift supaya teratur. terakhir, dindingnya sepertinya kurang tebal dan tidak kedap suara. tamu yang berlalu-lalang di hall (dan bahkan kamar sebelah) bisa sangat terdengar dari kamar.
translated_text: the condotel loft type room is quite spacious, but it is very visible from the furniture and electronics that this room is quite old. the hot water sometimes isn't really hot. the amenities are also just standard. internet speed? don't expect it. the breakfast menu options are varied, but nothing stands out in terms of taste. there is indonesian and western food too. it's quite okay if the thing that bothers me is the limited lift. maybe it's because the hotel is at full capacity, but there are too many guests taking the elevator. i had to wait a long time to use the elevator because it was always full of people who wanted to go down but joined the elevator that was going up. maybe there needs to be an officer to keep the elevator orderly. lastly, the walls seem to be not thick enough and not soundproof. guests passing by in the hall (and even the next room) can be very audible from the room.

text: Check in jam 9 malam, dapet kamar lantai 16. Sudah masuk kamar lantai 16 telepon lah ke operator karena bau rokok awalnya dibilang kamar penuh, lalu ditelpon dari operator ada di lantai 6. Dan dateng lah resepsionis yang saat saya check in ke kamar lantai 16 nanya pa kasurnya sudah dipake? maksud ngana kita masuk kamar hotel kalo ga pengen cpet-cpet rebahan mau berdiri sikap sempurna gitu?! Ngasi kunci kamar lantai 6 juga muka lu asem bos, nawarin bantuin bawa barang pun tidak.

Selain itu juga bila kita meminjam peralatan makan jika lebih dari 1 set akan dikenakan biaya tambahan. text: Hotel bagus, tapi pelayanannya kurang. Kebersihan kurang. Kamar dibersihkan, tapi plastik jatuh saja tidak terambil, ranjang hanya dibereskan dibagian cover nya saja, spreinya masih pada lecek. translated_text: good hotel, but service is lacking. lack of cleanliness. the room was cleaned, but the plastic fell off and wasn't picked up, the bed was only made up by the cover, the sheets were still wrinkled. coffee was not given again on the second day. the toiletries are also very minimal. for 5 star class hotels, they only provide small round soap for bathing, usually this soap is used for hand washing soap in the sink in 3 star hotels. for breakfast, no one informs you about what time you have to book at breakfast. we know that, because we asked the receptionist, then they were informed that we had to book. if you've already booked, you have to wait because of the waiting list, although the wait isn't too long. my question is, why do you ask customers to make a booking first if in the end those who book have to wait again?

text: Lokasi yang bagus. Menu kebersihan, kenyamanan, dan sarapan seperti yang diharapkan dari hotel bintang 4. Kamarnya luas, tapi kamar mandi agak terlalu kecil untuk seleraku. Namun, ada banyak hal yang perlu diperbaiki mengenai layanan ini. Saya tiba di hotel sekitar jam 9 malam setelah berkendara 4 jam dari Jakarta, dan saya pasti tidak perlu ribut lagi saat check-in. Ada antrian panjang untuk check-in, dapat dimengerti untuk malam akhir pekan di Bandung, tetapi hanya ada 2 staf yang melakukan resepsi sementara saya melihat staf lain hanya berdiri dan menonton di belakang. Saya tidak mendapatkan kamar seperti yang saya pesan. Saya secara khusus memesan tipe "Lembong Deluxe" karena saya ingin 1 tempat tidur ganda (seperti yang dijelaskan pada deskripsi kamar), tidak bergabung dengan tempat tidur kembar. Saya menyuarakan keluhan saya tetapi staf mengatakan bahwa setiap kamar untuk tipe itu hanya bergabung dengan tempat tidur kembar, bertentangan dengan apa yang dikatakan deskripsi dalam pemesanan saya. Tempat tidur yang digabung bahkan tidak terpasang dengan benar sehingga masih ada celah di tengah saya hanya bisa tidur di salah satu tempat tidur. Mereka tidak memberikan solusi untuk masalah saya dan hanya meminta maaf yang terdengar sangat tidak tulus kepada saya. Itu sudah sangat larut malam dan aku terlalu lelah untuk berurusan dengan drama jadi aku hanya memotongnya. Harap cantumkan deskripsi kamar persis seperti kondisi sebenarnya. Saya bisa saja memesan kamar lain dengan harga lebih murah jika saya ingin tempat tidur kembar. Satu hal lagi, makan malam di dalam kamar harus memiliki lebih banyak pilihan daripada hanya makanan ringan.
clean_text: lokasi yang bagus. menu kebersihan, kenyamanan, dan sarapan seperti yang diharapkan dari hotel bintang 4. kamarnya luas, tapi kamar mandi agak terlalu kecil untuk seleraku. namun, ada banyak hal yang perlu diperbaiki mengenai layanan ini. saya tiba di hotel sekitar jam 9 malam setelah berkendara 4 jam dari jakarta, dan saya pasti tidak perlu ribut lagi saat check-in. ada antrian panjang untuk check-in, dapat dimengerti untuk malam akhir pekan di bandung, tetapi hanya ada 2 staf yang melakukan resepsi sementara saya melihat staf lain hanya berdiri dan menonton di belakang. saya tidak mendapatkan kamar seperti yang saya pesan. saya secara khusus memesan tipe "lembong deluxe" karena saya ingin 1 tempat tidur ganda (seperti yang dijelaskan pada deskripsi kamar), tidak bergabung dengan tempat tidur kembar. saya menyuarakan keluhan saya tetapi staf mengatakan bahwa setiap kamar untuk tipe itu hanya bergabung dengan tempat tidur kembar, bertentangan dengan apa yang dikatakan deskripsi dalam pemesanan saya. tempat tidur yang digabung bahkan tidak terpasang dengan benar sehingga masih ada celah di tengah saya hanya bisa tidur di salah satu tempat tidur. mereka tidak memberikan solusi untuk masalah saya dan hanya meminta maaf yang terdengar sangat tidak tulus kepada saya. itu sudah sangat larut malam dan aku terlalu lelah untuk berurusan dengan drama jadi aku hanya memotongnya. harap cantumkan deskripsi kamar persis seperti kondisi sebenarnya. saya bisa saja memesan kamar lain dengan harga lebih murah jika saya ingin tempat tidur kembar. satu hal lagi, makan malam di dalam kamar harus memiliki lebih banyak pilihan daripada hanya makanan ringan.
translated_text: great location. cleanliness, comfort and breakfast menu as expected from a 4 star hotel. the room is spacious, but the bathroom is a bit too small for my taste. however, there are many things that need to be improved regarding this service. i arrived at the hotel around 9pm after driving 4 hours from jakarta, and i definitely didn't need to make any more fuss at check-in. there was a long queue to check in, understandable for a weekend night in bandung, but there were only 2 staff doing reception while i saw other staff just standing and watching in the back. i didn't get the room i ordered. i specifically booked the "lembong deluxe" type because i wanted 1 double bed (as explained in the room description), not joined twin beds. i voiced my complaint but the staff said that every room for that type only joins twin beds, contrary to what the description in my booking said. the combined beds weren't even installed properly so there was still a gap in the middle i could only sleep on one of the beds. they did not provide a solution to my problem and only apologized which sounded very insincere to me. it was very late at night and i was too tired to deal with the drama so i just cut it short. please include a description of the room exactly as it is in actual condition. i could have booked another room at a cheaper price if i wanted twin beds. one more thing, in-room dining should have more options than just snacks.

text: Layanan luar biasa, bersih. Namun ada furnitur kayu terkelupas, kursi untuk meja belajar memilikinya di sandaran tangannya, saya hampir tergores! Kulkas memiliki penumpukan es di dalam, dan tempat sabun berkarat. Saya mengerti hotel ini sudah tua dan saya ingin mencoba sebuah hotel dengan nuansa klasik. Tapi tolong jaga fasilitas / furnitur Anda. Saya benar-benar mengharapkan jendela kedap suara melihat bahwa ini adalah hotel bintang 4 di dekat jalur kereta api dan jalan yang sibuk, namun tidak. Makanan rata-rata. Saya juga harus menambahkan bahwa Anda tidak dapat meminta sopir goje * k (menggunakan sepeda motor) untuk mengantar Anda ke lobi, meskipun hujan dan Anda basah kuyup, mereka akan menghentikan Anda di dekat pintu masuk dan meminta Anda untuk berjalan dari sana, payung rusak yang mereka berikan juga tidak membantu. Layanan bintang 4 fasilitas bintang 2

translated_text: excellent service, clean. however there was chipped wooden furniture, the chair for the study table had it on the armrest, i almost scratched it! the refrigerator had ice buildup inside, and the soap dispenser was rusty. i understand this hotel is old and i want to try a hotel with a classic feel. but please take care of your facilities/furniture. i really expected the windows to be soundproof seeing that this is a 4 star hotel near a train line and busy road, however they weren't. average food. i should also add that you cannot ask a goje*k driver (on a motorbike) to take you to the lobby, even if it is raining and you are soaking wet, they will stop you near the entrance and ask you to walk from there, the umbrella is broken they gave also didn't help. 4 star service 2 star facilities

text: Secara keseluruhan, hotel ini cukup bagus. tapi kondisi kamarnya tidak terlalu bagus. karpet tampak berdebu dan kotor. ada keripik kentang di sudut ruangan yang belum disedot. ketika saya memindahkan tempat tidur ke samping, ada lebih banyak remah keripik kentang, sisa puff promina (saya tahu merek karena anak saya juga memakannya, selama masa balita awal), dan debu umum di bawah tempat tidur. Bukti bahwa staf kebersihan tidak pernah benar-benar membersihkan kamar setelah tamu menginap. Ketika saya memanggil layanan pembersihan kamar, butuh beberapa saat bagi mereka untuk datang. Dia cukup baik dan sopan. Sekilas dia juga membersihkan karpet secara menyeluruh. Tetapi setelah dia pergi, saya mencoba untuk memindahkan tempat tidur sedikit lebih, dan masih ada beberapa remahan 😂 Saya memutuskan untuk menyapu mereka di bawah tempat tidur. Meskipun kondisi kamar, saya puas dengan menu sarapan. Mereka memberi banyak pilihan, dari lokal ke internasional, dan rasanya enak. Makanannya dibumbui dengan baik, dan persediaannya cepat habis.

translated_text: overall, this hotel is quite good. but the condition of the room is not very good. the carpet looked dusty and dirty. there were potato chips in the corner of the room that had not been vacuumed up. when i moved the bed to the side, there were more potato chip crumbs, leftover promine puffs (i know the brand because my son ate them too, during his early toddler years), and general dust under the bed. evidence that the cleaning staff never actually cleans the rooms after guests stay. when i called the room cleaning service, it took a while for them to come. he is quite nice and polite. at a glance he also cleaned the carpet thoroughly. but after he left, i tried to move the bed a little more, and there were still some crumbs 😂 i decided to sweep them under the bed. despite the condition of the room, i was satisfied with the breakfast menu. they give lots of choices, from local to international, and the taste is delicious. the food is well seasoned, and supplies quickly run out.

translated_text: i've stayed here 3 times, 2x okay, the last time i stayed, i received unpleasant treatment, previously because i came by car, i was welcomed in the lobby, yesterday i came by motorbike because i wanted to go for a night walk around bandung city so i didn't get stuck in traffic, but when i wanted to check in, i wanted to keep my helmet on, the parking attendant wasn't friendly at all, as if he was taking the guests lightly because we came by motorbike, even though in the end we were allowed to leave them, in the morning because we had only been given 1 room key card previously, i walked to the room after swimming, when my husband wanted to ask. the extra card to the receptionist said you have to make a deposit first, so why weren't you told to make a deposit at the beginning of check in, because in some hotels we went to, we got 2 room key cards, sometimes they didn't always ask for a deposit, pullman and trans lux, you know. because i didn't just stay at the hotel once or twice, but often, i like the elroyale because the kids like the pool, but with the last experience yesterday, i've given up on not checking in at this hotel again. actually the room and meal service is okay, but other services should be good too, don't look at what vehicle we use. i was offended because i didn't use the car that day.

text: Awalnya kami check in sekitar pukul 3 sore, tapi kami belum masuk ke kamar hotel dikarenakan ingin menyelesaikan pekerjaan terlebih dahulu, kemudian pukul 9 kami naik ke kamar di lantai 9 tipe Pasundan Suite, kondisi kamar terlihat gelap dan baunya seperti sudah lama tidak di tempati, ada 2 tipe kamar di sini single dan dobel, yang kamar single bed lampu kamar tidak menyala, kami sudah telepon resepsionis untuk mengecek lampu tapi sampai 20 menit dan 4 x telepon masih belum ada teknisi yang datang, kemudian kami memutuskan untuk turun ke resepsionis tapi info kamar akan di cek, dan kami tidak berminat di kamar tersebut dan minta di downgrade kamar yang lebih terang, tapi memang agak lama prosesnya, dan akhirnya kamar di ganti dengan tipe yang sama di lantai 8, tapi sayangnya kulkas tidak dingin, TV ruang tengah juga tidak menyala, dan bathtub nya agak sedikit kotor, ada beberapa sisa cat mengelupas. translated_text: initially we checked in at around 3 in the afternoon, but we had not yet entered the hotel room because we wanted to finish work first, then at 9 we went up to the room on the 9th floor, pasundan suite type, the condition of the room looked dark and smelled like it had not been lived in for a long time, there are 2 types of rooms here single and double, in single bed rooms the room lights don't come on, we called the receptionist to check the lights but after 20 minutes and 4 phone calls still no technician came, then we decided to go down to the receptionist but the info the room will be checked, and we are not interested in that room and asked to be downgraded to a brighter room, but the process took quite a long time, and finally the room was replaced with the same type on the 8th floor, but unfortunately the refrigerator was not cold, neither was the tv in the living room it didn't turn on, and the bathtub was a little dirty, there was some paint residue peeling off. on the positive side, the food is still delicious. our suggestion is that before customers check in, they can check the room first to see whether it is still suitable for use or not, thank you.

Makanan pagi sangat standard, walaupun jumlahnya banyak. Namun tidak ada yang memenuhi kriteria sebagai hotel bintang empat, kalah jauh dengan hotel rumahan yang rasa dan kualitasnya sangat baik. 6. Tidak disarankan bagi yang baru bisa nyetir bawa mobil kesana. 7. Terlalu banyak mobil (dengan plat nomor tertentu) parkir di halaman depan, sehingga terkesan ada parkir eksklusif disitu. Bagi yang mau booking di sana bandingkan dulu dengan hotel tetangganya, masih banyak yang lebih baik dan jauh lebih murah. Harga yang saya bayar terlalu mahal untuk fasilitas yang didapatkan.

translated_text: the room booked was a hotel room, but check-in time ran out and according to the reception staff, they were upgraded to executive, but in reality they were given a room in a condotel, where the equipment in the room was not as expected. 1. the ac is not cold enough even though it is on continuously. while the sofa was torn. 2. towels are only given bath towels, no hand towels. 3. only 1 pillow, when asked for an additional pillow, an additional fee was requested (is this a 4 star hotel facility?) 4. shower water in a shower box, the water flow is very small and the direction it comes out is irregular, it is still more comfortable to shower in bamboo shower in the village. 5. breakfast food is very standard, even though the quantity is large. however, none of them meet the criteria of a four-star hotel, far inferior to home hotels whose taste and quality are very good. 6. 4 star hotel but parking is very narrow, especially for maneuvering in and out of the basement parking. and when you look at the many scratches on the wall, it means that there have been many victims of cars that were grazed there. even those who are experts at driving have to be extra careful, especially beginners. it is not recommended for those who are new to driving to take a car there. 7. too many cars (with certain number plates) are parked in the front yard, so it gives the impression that there is exclusive parking there. for those who want to book there, first compare it with neighboring hotels, there are still many that are better and much cheaper. the price i paid was too expensive for the facilities obtained.

text: Singkat cerita, saya bermalam dari tanggal 14 april hingga 16 april dari kamar 279 lembong deluxe dan 16 april ke 17 april ini sangat mengecewakan pelayanannya. Saya ditawarkan untuk proses pindahan akan diatur oleh pihak hotel untuk pindahan barang dan proses check in nya, dan kebetulan kami sekeluarga mau jalan-jalan ke luar maka itu saya persilahkan. Dan pukul 3.07pm saya coba hubungi pihak hotel dikatakan kamar belum dapat, yang notabene infonya bahwa maksimal check in adalah jam 3pm. Tapi karena saya masih di luar jadi saya minta pihak hotel untuk segera carikan kamar dan pindahkan barang-barang saya ke kamar yang baru dan pukul 5.15pm saya tiba di hotel dan ternyata barang-barang kami belum juga di pindahkan ke kamar baru, melainkan masih di lobby, saya tanya kenapa katanya orang-orang sibuk, dan saya jelas-jelas melihat ada sekitar 5-6 petugas hotel berkerumun di receptionist (silahkan bisa cek di rekaman cctv hotel) dan itu petugas sibuk ngobrol atau bagaimana? Kunci kamar yang baru pun belum disiapkan akhirnya kami harus menunggu lagi. Manager in charge dengan pak agah juga tidak bisa membantu banyak, hanya kata maaf yang selalu muncul. Kami sudah beberapa kali stay di sini, pelayanan biasa baik dan cepat, kenapa sekarang pelayanan nya menurun? Terima kasih.

translated_text: long story short, i spent the night from april 14 to april 16 from room 279 lembong deluxe and april 16 to april 17. the service was very disappointing. i was offered that the transfer process would be arranged by the hotel for the transfer of goods and the check-in process, and coincidentally our family wanted to go out for a trip so i invited them to do so. and at 3.07pm i tried to contact the hotel and they said they couldn't get the room yet, which in fact the information was that the maximum check in time was 3pm. but because i was still outside, i asked the hotel to immediately find a room and move my things to the new room and at 5.15pm i arrived at the hotel and it turned out that our things had not been moved to the new room, but were still in lobby, i asked why he said people were busy, and i clearly saw that there were around 5-6 hotel officers crowding at the receptionist (please check the hotel cctv footage) and were the officers busy chatting or what? the new room key hadn't been prepared yet so we had to wait again. the manager in charge and mr. agah also couldn't help much, only the word sorry always appeared. we have stayed here several times, the service is usually good and fast, why is the service declining now? thank you.

text: Ini bukan kali pertama saya menginap di eL Royale, saya memesan kamar merdeka twin, saya diberi kamar di pojokan dekat dengan tangga darurat, awal masuk sih biasa saja tapi ketika sudah malam saya coba nyalakan beberapa lampu tapi tidak semuanya menyala, yang menyala hanya di bed bagian kiri lampu kamar mandi di depan pintu, sisanya tidak nyala sama sekali. Kemudian tidak ada colokan listrik, colokan listrik yang tersedia tidak menyala sama sekali, ketika saya akan mencharger HP colokan listrik tidak menyala, hanya tersisa colokan untuk TV yang berfungsi dan terletak dibawah meja. Kemudian sinyal TV pun sangat jelek, gambar tidak bagus, saya tidak komplain masalah ini ke CS, saya pikir hanya semalam menginap disini. Hanya saja saya yang sudah beberapa kali menginap disini baru kali ini pelayanan dari eL Royale mengecewakan.

text: Setelah check in ke hotel, saya menelepon Room Service sekitar pukul 10:50 untuk memesan secangkir kopi hitam, tapi saya diberitahu bahwa hal itu tidak mungkin karena mesin telah dimatikan untuk malam ini. Hah?! Saya memprotes! Buku itu kira-kira empat bintang, dan hotel bintang empat harus bisa menyajikan secangkir kopi hitam sederhana kapan saja siang dan malam. Ini benar-benar mengecewakan saya, dan setelah di pingpong ke beberapa orang, akhirnya saya mendapatkan secangkir kopi yang saya minta bersama dua makanan yang saya pesan dari menu Layanan Kamar. Sangat payah! Manajemen hotel ini jelas tidak mengerti arti keramahan.

translated_text: after checking into the hotel, i called room service around 10:50 to order a cup of black coffee, but i was told that was not possible because the machine had been turned off for the night. hah?! i protest! the book is about four stars, and a four star hotel should be able to serve a simple cup of black coffee at any time of the day or night. this really disappointed me, and after ping ponging around a few people, i finally got the cup of coffee i requested along with the two items i ordered from the room service menu. so lame! this hotel management clearly does not understand the meaning of hospitality.

text: I choose condolite rooms for 2 nights (around 1.6 million rupiah per night). Lifts are always full and the lift button is not connected between the four lifts, so almost every floor the lift was opened since everyone pressed all 4 lift buttons. When I forgot to bring my room card, I asked the staff to help me to tap the lift but the staff said I can choose the left lift without the card. But it is taking too long to wait since the lift has two doors. Come one can't you just help me tap the lift. My wife and my 3 years old kid went to a restaurant first, then I came later after a bath. But when I went to the restaurant the employee said there were 2 guests already there. Come one do you also count my 3 years old kid as a restaurant guest? The restaurant staff are so mean. My wife wants to take out some leftover food since my 3 years old kid hasn't finished his breakfast. But the female staff said my wife cannot take the leftovers. Come on why you are treating your guests like that. This is my first experience staying in this hotel. I want to have a memorable stay since the hotel is always full and looks nice. But in the end it is not as I expected. Other than that I think the hotel is quite ok. So please improve the lift and restaurant policy. Please treat your guests so they want to come back to this hotel. The food you share with the guest can be their reason to come back again, again, and again.

text: Saya disuruh menunggu kamar sampai hampir 1 jam setelah check in. Ketika saya tanya resepnionis nya baru room saya di daftarkan. Sebeginikah hotel kelas bintang 4?

translated_text: i was told to wait for my room until almost 1 hour after checking in. when i asked the receptionist, my room was registered. is this what a 4 star class hotel is like?

text: Pertama masuk security di depan ga ada nawarin turunin barang untuk di bawa ke kamar, posisi suami saya masih di mobil dan saya urus check in. Security malah suruh suami saya mundurin mobil, terus disuruh majuin mobil, kaya nya tuh security mikir suami saya driver online (padahal harus nya di tanya dong apa ada barang atau ngga yang mau diturunin, di hotel bintang 3 aja elayanan nya bagus, ini hotel bintang 4 begini banget. Dan parah nya, suami nenteng 2 koper dan 5 tentengan besar, itu semua pegawai hotel di lobi cuma ngeliatin, ga ada inisiatif samperin dan tolongin untuk bantu bawain, padahal suami sempet berhenti. Karyawan ada banyak tapi diem aja, dan posisi hotel tidak crowded malah terbilang sepi. Untuk kamar bersih dan karena baru renovasi jadi oke, dapet kamar merdeka twin terang banget. Minus closet rusak, bantal keras banget (ini minta di ganti, untung bagian cleaning nya baik mau cariin bantal yang lebih empuk), kasur juga keras banget. Bagus nya minta tambah handuk dikasih free, dan waktu check in jam 12 sudah bisa masuk karena hotel tidak ramai. Shock pas minta es batu ternyata harus beli 18.150 dan cuma semangkok. Gila hotel bintang 4 es batu bayar, padahal selama saya nginep di hotel bintang 3, 4, 5 di tempat lain es batu free loh. Komersil banget nih hotel. Yang lebih ngeselin nya hari kedua saya kurang fit dan minta tolong breakfast untuk di antar ke kamar, eh di jawab ga bisa dong, ga tau emang ga bisa apa pegawai nya aja males. Ini hotel bintang 4 pelayanan kaya hotel ga ada bintang. Menu makanan juga ga kaya hotel bintang 4 lain, saya lebih mirip hotel budget 😫 hotel ini ketolong sama kolam renang nya yang ada air panas nya. Tapi kaya nya ga akan balik lagi karena pelayanan bener bener jelek, berasa nginep di hotel yang ga ada bintang nya. (Hotel bintang 3 aja pelayanan masih oke). Oh iya buat yang punya anak di atas 4 tahun makanan bayar lagi 75.000, ga peduli mereka anak nya cuma minum susu or sereal. Yang jaga di depan resto sampe 4 orang 😂 untuk rasa makanan nya 7/10 sambel kebanyakan daun jeruk. Pokok nya ini hotel bintang 4 ter bad yang pernah saya nginepin. Bukan masalah kamar tapi di pelayanannya. Training lagi karyawan nya, gimana cara hotel bintang 4 memperlakukan tamu. Dan ini kamar hotel juga berisik banget, suara kereta kedengeran, ga kedap suara, suara motor kedengeran padahal di lantai 9
