translated_text: first, when i entered security at the front, no one offered to drop off my items to take to the room, my husband was still in the car and i took care of checking in. security actually told my husband to put the car back, then he was told to move the car forward, it's like the security thought my husband was an online driver (even though he should have asked if there was anything he wanted to drop off or not, even at a 3 star hotel the service was good, this is a star hotel 4 things like this, and what's worse, my husband was carrying 2 suitcases and 5 large bags, all the hotel employees in the lobby were just looking, they didn't take the initiative to come over and help carry them, even though there were lots of employees at the time but they just kept quiet and were in position the hotel wasn't crowded, in fact it was quiet for a clean room and because it had just been renovated it was okay, i got the independent twin room, it was really bright minus the broken toilet, the pillow was really hard (this asked to be replaced, luckily the cleaning department was good, i wanted to find a softer pillow), the mattress was also very hard. it was a good thing if you asked for extra towels, you were given it for free, and when you checked in at 12 you were able to enter because the hotel was not busy. it's crazy that 4 star hotels pay for ice cubes, even though as long as i stay in 3, 4, 5 star hotels in other places ice cubes are free, you know. this hotel is very commercial. what was even more annoying was that on the second day i wasn't fit enough and asked for breakfast to be delivered to my room, but i was answered that i couldn't, i don't know if i could or the staff were just lazy. this is a 4 star hotel, the service is like a hotel with no stars. the food menu is also not like other 4 star hotels, i think it's more like a budget hotel 😫 this hotel helps with its swimming pool which has hot water. but i don't think i'll come back because the service is really bad, it feels like i'm staying in a hotel that doesn't have any stars. (even 3 star hotels, service is still okay). oh yes, for those who have children over 4 years old, food will pay another 75,000, it doesn't matter if their child only drinks milk or cereal. there are up to 4 people guarding the front of the restaurant 😂 the taste of the food is 7/10, the sauce is mostly lime leaves. basically, this is the worst 4 star hotel i have ever stayed at. it's not a problem with the room but with the service. more training for employees, how do 4 star hotels treat guests. and this hotel room is also very noisy, you can hear the train, it's not soundproof, you can hear the motorbike even though it's on the 9th floor

Pdhl housekeeping nya pd baik2 lokasi jg strategis sayang aja udh males duluan sm Front Office nya ga yg laki2 yg perempuan attitude nya ga bgt, ga dikasih tau ada welcome drink jg, sarapan jam brp dan dimana. translated_text: the front office is not pleasant at all. first, from booking, i already requested a connecting room, when i checked in it said it was full, finally asked for the one next door, at 2 o'clock the other one was still waiting. because i got a room a bit far away, i asked for a smoking one so i could be next to the kids. i've been waiting until 4 o'clock when there's only one ready, and even then the front office calls from the table instead of coming to where we're sitting, even though it's just in front of him, it's "ma'am, ma'am!" from the table (even though we were really tired and had been waiting since 2 o'clock). it was already 5 o'clock and the key to the other room hadn't been delivered yet, finally i called downstairs to ask if it was ready or not, it didn't take long for me to deliver the key... it turned out the room wasn't next door :/ even though the room next door was the same type, it was ready and empty :/ finally asked for that room so i could right next to it. i got a phone call from the front office saying "i can't ask you to move rooms, okay?" we were clear from the start that it was ok, it's okay to wait so we can just go to the side, why not wait until 5 o'clock to get the key. even though the housekeeping is good and the location is also strategic, it's a shame that i'm already lazy because the front office is not male or female, the attitude isn't great, we weren't told there was a welcome drink either, what time and where to have breakfast. it's better to go to training again, to go back there, think again, there are lots of other hotels with the same budget, the service is much better.

Pinjam handuk aja berbayar, apalagi pinjam bantal. Dipastikan tidak akan balik lagi ke hotel ini.

Kami sama sekali tidak bisa tidur. Kami sudah komplain pimdah kamar dari awal tapi ternyata katanya penuh. Saat kami ingin upgrade ke kamar lebih bagus juga tidak bisa karena penuh. translated_text: this is more than 5 times i have stayed here. usually it's always okay, satisfied, you get a nice room as expected. according to request. it turned out that when i got the room it didn't match my expectations, i got room 1063. the view was not the swimming pool but the view of the train tracks. at first it wasn't a problem, but it got more uncomfortable as it went on. apart from the fact that the water pipe attached to the wall makes a sound when used. and in the next room, even if the bathroom is in use, it can be heard in my room. noisy very noisy. even at night we couldn't sleep in our room because of the noise of trains passing by. and the cretan horn that always sounds when passing by. midnight and dawn are the same. we couldn't sleep at all. we complained about moving rooms from the start but it turned out to be full. when we wanted to upgrade to a better room we couldn't because it was full. very disappointed because usually we are always comfortable staying there. then he always comes back again.

Beda dengan hotel ini saat minta dianterin atau bahkan sudah saya tawarkan agar makanan anak saya antar ke atas, malah pegawai di restorannya awalnya menolak, katanya anaknya suruh kebawah aja padahal anak saya lagi ga enak badan dibawah crowded. translated_text: i've been to 4 star hotels several times, the prices are similar to el hotel, but every time i ask for help to take the child's food to the hotel room, the hotel wants no frills, a b c d. it's different from this hotel, when i asked to be taken home or i even offered to take my child's food upstairs, the employee at the restaurant initially refused, saying that his child had just told him to go downstairs even though my child wasn't feeling well under the crowd. then asked to exchange for 1 voucher even though children under 5 years old are free. my 4 year old child asked for just soup and rice but the employee objected only after i said he wanted to talk to the supervisor then the food could be brought to the room and he also gave me lontong using soto sauce, the sauce was poor in spices so at least there was meat in it. oh my, the face of the employee at the restaurant is so bitchy, i forgot to write down his name. woman. hopefully we can educate the hotel management.

Yang oke cuma staff hotel ramah, kolam renang air nya ga dingin atau bisa dibilang anget. Overall ga tertarik untuk balik lagi sih. text: Check in malem-malem, sbelum check in udah nanya dulu kamarnya ada bathtub ga, katanya ada. Terus kita nyari kamarnya dari lift 1 ke lift 1 nya, semua ga ada pencetan lantai 2. Kondisi saya hamil besar, ga ada diarahin harus kemana sampe nyarinyari lift yang bisa ke lantai 2, ternyata paling ujung banget. Nyampe kamar tau tau ga ada bathtub. Ngomong ke resepsionis nya jadi harus ganti kamar lagi. AC nya panas kamarnya. Ampun deh. Terus pagi breakfast, jam 10 kurang 15 saya udah di restonya, katanya udah close. Harus pindah resto yang bawah katanya. Udah di restonya anak saya nangis-nangis ga bisa diem 2-2 nya. Saya pikir mau makan di kamar aja karena anak-anak ga betah di resto nya. Masih pada ngantuk kayaknya. Makanannya udah di meja. Udah kita ambil. Mau minta makanannya kita bawa ke kamar, makan di kamar aja. Ga boleh dong. Terus saya bilang ini makanan kan sayang yah kalo ga dibawa, kita kan ga ada yang makan dan pastinya jadi dibuang. Jawabannya mau di simpan (?). Ya kali makanan udah di cicip-cicip sama anak-anak terus mau di simpan. Ini pengalaman terburuk saya loh! Asli. Bikin emosi banget staff nya. Akhirnya makanan disuruh ditinggal. Bener bener ga profesional banget, pelayanan terburuk sekelas hotel bintang 4.

text: Pelayanan Dinner Panoramic cukup lama, minuman milk shake baru keluar setelah makanan datang, katanya ada movie ternyata tidak ada. Parahnya ada kecoa di dalam restoran lantai 19. Service restonya too slow untuk malam tersebut. Kebersihan kamar kurang kaca lemari debunya masih tebal. Makanan breakfast memang banyak tapi rasanya biasa saja. Handuk tebal tapi sobek sobek pinggiranya. Service di kolam renang oke tapi airnya strong sekali bau kaporitnya. Untuk harga 1.2 juta rasanya belum worth it. Sup buntut enak tapi tidak panas, steak burger too dry, chicken gordon bluenya juga gak cheesee, minta blackpepper sauce rasanya seperti mushroom sauce. Cukup deh di eL Hotel Royale Bandung gak perlu kembali lagi.

translated_text: the panoramic dinner service took quite a long time, the milk shakes only came out after the food arrived, they said there was a movie but apparently there wasn't any. what's worse, there were cockroaches in the restaurant on the 19th floor. the restaurant service was too slow for that night. room cleanliness is lacking, cupboard glass, dust is still thick. breakfast food is plentiful but the taste is ordinary. the towel is thick but the edges are torn. service at the swimming pool is okay but the water smells very strong of chlorine. for the price of 1.2 million it doesn't seem worth it. the oxtail soup was delicious but not hot, the steak burger was too dry, the chicken gordon blue wasn't cheesey either, asked for blackpepper sauce it tasted like mushroom sauce. that's enough at el hotel royale bandung, no need to come back again.

text: Awal nya menyenangkan karna dpt kamar langsung ke swimming pool, tp berakhir dgn byk nya ketidak nyamanan, jam 12 mlm bel pintu kamar trus bunyi sampai telp untuk perbaikan tp lama nya minta ampun petugas nya dtg smp di telp lagi baru dtg, akhir nya anak2 bangun karna suara berisik bel pintu yang terus2an menyala, coba untuk kembali tidur lampu dan ac berkali2 mati pula, jam 1:30 mlm bel pintu kembali menyala terus2an dan akhir nya kami n anak2 kembali terbangun dan tdk bisa tdr kembali sampai pagi. Pagi nya anak2 ke area swimming pool dikarenakan istri saya berhijab tdk di perkenankan pakai kaos lengan panjang harus dengan pakaian renang padahal hanya di area kolam anak2, di tegur security dan selama di swimming pool security trus melihati kami sekeluarga, hadehhhhh sangat tidak nyaman kita bayarrrr loh tdk gratisssss. Pengalaman menginap yg parah di el royal

translated_text: at first it was fun because you got a room straight to the swimming pool, but it ended with a lot of discomfort, at 12 pm the room door bell kept ringing until you called for repairs but it took a long time, sorry, the officer came to the junior high school and then called again, then finally the children woke up. because of the noise the doorbell kept going on, trying to go back to sleep the lights and air conditioning went off again and again, at 1:30 pm the doorbell came back on again and again and finally we and the kids woke up again and couldn't go back to sleep until morning. in the morning the children went to the swimming pool area because my wife was wearing a hijab and she was not allowed to wear long sleeved t-shirts, she had to wear swimwear even though it was only in the children's pool area, she was reprimanded by security and while in the swimming pool, security kept looking at us as a family, hadehhhhh, it was very uncomfortable, we paid, you know? not freessss. terrible experience staying at el royal

text: Kemarin saat saya stay di hotel itu tanggal 9-11 desember, saya minta tolong untuk press baju yang akan saya pake untuk acara wedding malam itu. Ternyata waktu mereka press baju saya gosong di bagian lengan, sedangkan baju itu adalah baju yang mau saya pakai. Betul, mereka minta maaf dan saya meminta mereka untuk mencarikan baju seperti itu lagi sebagai tanda kompensasi, dan mereka juga janji untuk menggantikan baju tersebut. Tapi karena tanggal 11 itu saya check out, mereka berjanji untuk ngabarin via telepon dan baju itu akan di kirim ke tempat saya dalam kurun waktu 1 minggu dari saya check out, dan saya tunggu sampai sekarang saya belum dapat apa-apa, even managernya pun yang sudah berjanji untuk mengabari saya tidak melakukan apa yang di janjikannya.

text: Dari segi kamar: bathtub ada kekelupas dalamnya dekat lubang buang, wastafel pembuangannya kurang bagus sehingga air bergenang pas cuci tangan (lama surutnya), sofanya kotor sepertinya bekas tinta atau apa yang jelas jadi ragu untuk dudukin, walpapernya bagian sambungan antar walpapernya banyak yang terkelupas. Dari segi makanan: makanan paling parah menurut saya, review di youtube tersedia berbagai makanan yang katanya lezat tapi saat saya menginap menu sarapannya sangat standart dan ada beberapa makanan yang terasa tidak segar. 1. Capcay atau sayurnya terasa asam kurang segar mungkin karena percampuran semua sayur yang kurang pas di dalemnya brokoli, kembang kol, jamur, kembang tahu, jagung muda dan lain-lain kurang segar. 2. Nasi berasanya kurang enak ga jelas terlihat kuning seperti nasi kuning tapi ada beberapa rempah nasi briyani gitu. 3. Mie kocok: basonya tepung doang tidak terasa daging mending tidak usah sekalian karena ngerusak rasanya padahal mienya enak. 4. Buburnya kuahnya bening dan aneh perpaduannya ga cocok. 5. Banrosnya kurang kelapanya. 6. Telur ceploknya dingin padahal dah minta di buatin baru. 7. Pilihan pastrynya ga menarik padahal bintang 4. Bikin kecewa menu breakfast nya sangat amat tidak enak dan variasinya kurang. Padahal bintang 4, setidaknya kalopun variasi makanannya dikit rasanya di tingkatin dong harusnya. Ini menunya indo semua pula dan mana rasa indonya ga dapet. Mie kocok, bubur ayam, banros rasanya gagal. Kamarnya juga tidak terawat.

translated_text: in terms of the room: the bathtub has a chip on the inside near the drain hole, the sink drain is not good so the water pools when you wash your hands (it takes a long time to recede), the sofa is dirty, it looks like there are ink marks or something so i'm hesitant to sit on it, the wallpaper at the joints between the wallpaper is peeling off a lot. in terms of food: the food is the worst in my opinion, reviews on youtube provide various foods which are said to be delicious but when i stayed the breakfast menu was very standard and there were some foods that didn't taste fresh. 1. the capcay or vegetables taste sour and not fresh, perhaps because the mixture of all the vegetables is not quite right in the broccoli, cauliflower, mushrooms, tofu flower, baby corn and others which are not fresh enough. 2. the rice doesn't taste good, it doesn't look yellow like yellow rice, but there are some spices in the briyani rice. 3. shaken noodles: the meatballs are just flour and don't taste like meat. it's better not to use them at all because it ruins the taste even though the noodles are delicious. 4. the porridge has a clear sauce and it's strange that the combination doesn't match. 5. the banros lacks coconut. 6. the fried egg was cold even though i asked to make it fresh. 7. the choice of pastry is not interesting even though it is a 4 star. disappointingly the breakfast menu is very, very bad and there is not enough variety. even though it's 4 stars, at least even if there's a little variety in the food, it should be improved. this menu is all indo and you can't get the indonesian taste. shaken noodles, chicken porridge, banros taste like failure. the rooms are also not maintained.

text: Sengaja pilih hotel yang bintang 4 dengan ekspektasi bisa istirahat nyaman & layanan ok. Tapi malah kecewa. Baru masuk kamar pesan kamar non smoking tapi begitu masuk kamar, kamar mandinya bau rokok. Yang bener-bener bau banget padahal bawa anak 2 tahun. Komplen dan dikasih semprotan, reda bentar terus baunya muncul lagi. Lebih tepatnya baunya samar karena semprotannya wangi. Tapi kan tidak menyelesaikan masalah. Akhirnya telpon layanan lagi karena tidak tahan banget baunya, ditawarin air purifier tapi nunggu agak lama. Setelah di air purifier udah mending tapi masih agak bau. Karena suami sensitif banget bau rokok, akhirnya terpaksa suami harus bersihin dan gosok tembok kamar mandi pake sabun biar tidak bau. Baru abis itu bener-bener gabau rokok. Terlalu bertele-bertele, kenapa tidak dipindah kamar lain yang memang ok. Atau dibersihin ulang kamar mandinya sekalian di air purifier. Jendela kamar 372 di stiker jadi gabisa liat pemandangan luar. Kamarnya kurang kedap suara, suara dari kamar sebelah geser-geser kasur kedengeran di kamar saya, suara dari lorong juga masuk ke kamar. Ganggu banget orang mau istirahat, apalagi bawa anak kecil seperti saya. Pas di tengah makan, anak nangis minta balik kamar, pas mau turun ngejar anak, eskalatornya belum nyala. Hello padahal sudah jm 06.30, sarapannya di lantai 1. Kenapa tidak dinyalain coba.

translated_text: i deliberately chose a 4 star hotel with the expectation of a comfortable rest & good service. but instead disappointed. just entered the room and ordered a non-smoking room but as soon as i entered the room, the bathroom smelled of cigarettes. which really smells really bad even though i brought a 2 year old child. complained and was given a spray, it subsided for a while then the smell appeared again. more precisely, the smell is faint because the spray is fragrant. but that doesn't solve the problem. finally i called the service again because i couldn't stand the smell, i was offered an air purifier but i waited a long time. after using the air purifier, it got better but still smelled a bit. because my husband is very sensitive to the smell of cigarettes, in the end he was forced to clean and scrub the bathroom walls with soap so it didn't smell. only after that did i really stop smelling of cigarettes. too long-winded, why not move to another room which is ok. or re-clean the bathroom and use an air purifier. the window in room 372 is stickered so you can't see the view outside. the room was not soundproof, the sound from the next room of the bed being shifted could be heard in my room, the sound from the hallway also entered the room. it's really annoying for people to want to rest, especially with small children like me. in the middle of eating, the child cried and asked to go back to his room, when he wanted to go down to chase the child, the escalator wasn't on yet. hello, even though it's already 06.30, breakfast is on the 1st floor. why don't you try turning it on.

text: Nginap di kamar 474 tanggal 1 April 2023. Tempat tidur berkutu/kepinding, seprai ga pernah diganti, gatal semalaman kulit sampai luka, minta air minum untuk makan obat pagi tidak diberi alasan sudah mau check out. Lapor sama FO ga ada penyelesaian hanya jawab o, minta ketemu MOD saya disuruh nunggu 30 menit, MOD tidak ada solusi penyelesaian. Hanya senyum-senyum saja dan membilang kami mengerti, tidak tau kalao minta air untuk minum obat, bla bla bla dan seterusnya. Sangat mengecewakan.
clean_text: nginap di kamar 474 tanggal 1 april 2023. tempat tidur berkutu/kepinding, seprai ga pernah diganti, gatal semalaman kulit sampai luka, minta air minum untuk makan obat pagi tidak diberi alasan sudah mau check out. lapor sama fo ga ada penyelesaian hanya jawab o, minta ketemu mod saya disuruh nunggu 30 menit, mod tidak ada solusi penyelesaian. hanya senyum-senyum saja dan membilang kami mengerti, tidak tau kalao minta air untuk minum obat, bla bla bla dan seterusnya. sangat mengecewakan.
translated_text: stayed in room 474 on april 1 2023. the bed had lice/bedbugs, the sheets were never changed, the skin itched all night to the point of sores, asked for drinking water to take medicine in the morning and was not given a reason for wanting to check out. reported to fo, there was no solution, just answered o, asked to meet the mod, i was told to wait 30 minutes, the mod didn't have a solution. just smile and say we understand, don't know if you ask for water to take medicine, blah blah blah and so on. very disappointing.

text: Melihat rating yang tinggi, tertarik untuk menginap di sini. Ternyata tidak sesuai keinginan. Memesan type kamar Kana Executive Condotel rate Rp. 1.676.764 dengan harapan mendapatkan kamar dan fasilitas sebanding dengan type kamarnya tetap kecewa berat. Furniture jadul, kamar gelap, pengap, sirkulasi udara buruk, ventilasi kurang, auranya tidak baik sehingga anak saya balita merasa ketakutan dan menangis. Hotel kelas bintang rasa melati. Saya orang yang paling jarang sekali review tentang hotel kalo nggak parah banget seperti ini. Tidak akan pernah kembali lagi ke sini.
clean_text: melihat rating yang tinggi, tertarik untuk menginap di sini. ternyata tidak sesuai keinginan. memesan type kamar kana executive condotel rate rp. 1.676.764 dengan harapan mendapatkan kamar dan fasilitas sebanding dengan type kamarnya tetap kecewa berat. furniture jadul, kamar gelap, pengap, sirkulasi udara buruk, ventilasi kurang, auranya tidak baik sehingga anak saya balita merasa ketakutan dan menangis. hotel kelas bintang rasa melati. saya orang yang paling jarang sekali review tentang hotel kalo nggak parah banget seperti ini. tidak akan pernah kembali lagi ke sini.
translated_text: seeing the high rating, interested in staying here. it turned out not to be what you wanted. book the kana executive condotel room type, rate idr. 1,676,764 in the hope of getting a room and facilities comparable to the room type but was still very disappointed. old furniture, dark, stuffy room, poor air circulation, lack of ventilation, bad aura so my toddler felt scared and cried. star class hotel with jasmine flavor. i'm the person who rarely reviews hotels if they're not really bad like this. will never come back here again.

text: Kunci hanya dikasi 1 kalau nambah deposit 100k akses lift terlalu jauh dan membingungkan krn ada 2 dgn nomor yg hampir sama
clean_text: kunci hanya dikasi 1 kalau nambah deposit 100k akses lift terlalu jauh dan membingungkan krn ada 2 dgn nomor yg hampir sama
translated_text: only given 1 key if you add a deposit of 100k, lift access is too far and confusing because there are 2 with almost the same number

text: Kan gue nginep 2 malem dan udah langsung pesen 2 malem (ga kepisah semalem2 pesennya) dari traveloka. Gue langsung booking 1 kamar buat 3 orang. Di e-ticket udah tertulis untuk 3 guest. Check-in lah gue di hotel, gue bilang ke mba2 receptionist nya. “mba saya udah pesen buat 3 orang loh” mba2nya jawab “iya pak, memang kamar kami bisa untuk 3 orang, dikamar sudah ada sofa bed” tapi gue bilang lagi ke mbanya “tapi mba, saya udah pesen langsung untuk 3 orang berarti sarapan jg udh langsung buat 3 ya mba” mba2nya jawab “oh nggak mas, sarapan tetep 2, yg satu kena charge berarti” masih gue iyain tidur semalem dengan tidak ada tambahan extra bed dan sarapan pagi yg kena charge 1 orang. Trus kan kakak gue nginep disitu jg, tp cuma semalem (di hari berikutnya) dengan harga yg lebih murah.. Gue pikir kamarnya beda, karena gue pikir kamar gue buat 3 org yg ada sofa bed nya. Tapi ternyata kakak gue dpt kamar yg sama dong jenisnya sama gue. Malem berikutnya gue complain dong! “bedanya apa sama kamar kakak saya? Kok saya bayar lebih mahal??” mas2 yg lagi jaga di receptionist saat itu jawab “oh iya pak maaf, seharusnya kamar bapak sudah termasuk extra bed dan sarapan untuk 3 orang” saat itu jg dikembalikanlah uang sarapan yg gue bayar td pagi plus ditambahin extra bed dikamar gue. Tapi pas check-out gue complain lg dong! “saya ga dpt complement apa2 nih atas kesalahan yg kemarin semalem lg saya harusnya dpt extra bed?” sedangkan penambahan extra bed itu 400rb, mayan bgt kan, masa yg dibalikin cuma uang sarapannya doang! Setelah gue complain sama manager yg namanya pak fajar, gue disuruh nunggu agak lama. Tapi pas keluar tu manager ga ngasih solusi apapun! Gila kali ya. Dikira waktu gue gratis apa? Mereka bener2 ga bisa ngasih solusi atas kesalahan mereka dan ga bisa ngasih complement apapun. Abis itu gue ga mau buang waktu gue lagi. Langsung aja gue cabut. Dan untuk kalian, jangan pernah nginep di situ gue saranin. Karena masa pas di lantai kolam renangnya lift penuh bgt, gue nanya sama satpam disitu, tangga darurat sebelah mana, maksudnya gue mau lewat tangga darurat aja biar cepet daripada nungguin lift. Tapi tau ga apa yg dibilang satpamnya? “ga ada mas tangga daruratnya di lantai ini, ada sih tapi pintunya susah dibuka” what the. Gila kali ya? Kalo ada apa2 masa jalan satu2nya cuma lift?

text: Pengalaman sangat buruk sekali menginap di sini, mulai dari pertama datang dari parkiran belakang mau masuk di sambut dengan security sangat tidak bersahabat, terus kebetulan hari itu saya membawa kendaraan bermotor, besoknya pas mau check-out menuju parkiran helm di motor yang terkunci hilang helmnya, helm baru saja di beli beberapa jam sebelumnya aneh helm terkunci tapi bisa hilang di parkiran yang begitu banyak securitynya, dan tidak ada penyelesaian atas kehilangan helm itu, bukan karena masalah harga helmnya cuma kecewa saja dengan pelayanan keamanan disana.

translated_text: very bad experience staying here, starting from the first time i came from the back parking lot and wanted to enter, i was greeted by very unfriendly security, then coincidentally that day i brought a motorized vehicle, the next day when i wanted to check out i went to the parking lot, my helmet was missing on the locked motorbike, my helmet was missing, the helmet had just been bought a few hours before. it's strange that the helmet is locked but it can be lost in a parking lot where there is so much security, and there is no solution for losing the helmet, not because of the price of the helmet, just disappointed with the security service there.

text: Pesen kamar non smoking. Pas masuk bau asap rokok dimana mana. Katanya hari biasa kamar ini smoking, khusus weekend kamarnya gak boleh ngerokok, jadi hari ini jadi kamar non smoking. Gak gitu dong konsepnya! Kalo kamar non smoking tuh hari apapun gak boleh smoking. Ini residu orang ngerokok kemarin nempel semua dimana mana. Masa saya ada anak balita, kasian anakku tidur kamar bau asap. Hotel rasa kantin supir. Mana gak ada shampo. Kasur keras. Sofa bercak noda. Breakfast bervariasi tp gak ada yang enak. Menang lobby nya doang bagus. Kapok! Cari hotel lain aja.

text: Salah satu pengalaman menginap terburuk saya! Saya check in jam 5 pagi, breakfast jam 6 akhirnya jam 7 baru tidur. Saya bangun jam 2 siang, tiba tiba ada room boy nya masuk dengan akses master, padahal kan aksesnya di saya belum dikembalikan, room boy nya kirain sudah check out, keterlaluan banget masa bisa masuk begitu aja, kalau lagi gapake baju gimana? Terus saya check out jam 3 kena charge 200rb, tapi dikasi bukti “deposit receipt” bukan invoice yang di print untuk late check out. Keterlaluan.

translated_text: one of my worst stays ever! i checked in at 5 in the morning, had breakfast at 6 and finally went to sleep at 7. i woke up at 2 in the afternoon, suddenly the room boy came in with master access, even though my access had not been returned, the room boy thought he had already checked out, it was too much to just come in, what if i didn't have any clothes on? then i checked out at 3 o'clock and was charged 200 thousand, but i was given proof of "deposit receipt" instead of a printed invoice for late check out. outrageous.
